heading: One Hot True
about: A neural net trained on mnist dataset to recognize digits from 28x28 images using Tensorflow without using convolutional model (accuracy ~ 95%) .

heading: Ionic Messenger
about: A chat app made for android and iOS for demonstrating obscure features such as going private with another user, giving a specific time to a message etc.

heading: Code Scrapper
about: A desktop app for Linux, Windows and Mac to download code from competitive programming websites.

heading: Memory Sequences
about: A web app for blogging with everything written from scratch. Made this to teach myself Angular 4 + Typescript.

heading: Creek
about: A simple web app to keep track of new albums from bands you love. No manually adding bands, just use last.fm credentials and know when a new album drops with all it's info.

heading: Instacode Online Judge
about: An online compiler and judge where algorithmic problems are to be solved under contrained memory and time limit.

heading: Time My Show
about: A web app to keep track of your favourite television shows by notifying for new episodes.

heading: SAE KIET
about: Official website for a college club SAE KIET (mech. engineering) re-written in AngularJs.

heading: Code Hour
about: Code Hour is an open-source webapp which allows you to keep track of competitive programming contests across all websites.

heading: Instanotes
about: A website that lets students from my college as well as from other Engineering colleges search for class notes.

heading: Chart App
about: A webapp to demonstrate various types of charts and graphs using FusionCharts API. Supports JSON & CSV formats.

heading: WYSIWYG Editor
about: WYSIWYG editor with Medium (blogging website) like features written in Vanilla JavaScript.

heading: Decibel Music Player
about: Music player app for Windows 8.1 desktop. Made this to teach myself programming!

heading: Personal Website (2016)
about: My personal website of 2016 written in Vanilla Javascript.

heading: Personal Website (2015)
about: My personal website of 2015 written in vanilla Javascript.

heading: Personal Website
about: Personal website for a client written in Vanilla Javascript.

heading: SAE KIET
about: Official website of SAE KIET written in Vanilla Javascript
